Justification of Pre-Qualified Suppliers Process Applied
full_summary:
----------------

### Solicitation for Laboratory Equipment and Supplies

**Title:** The delivery and installation of two (2) automated sample dilution stations, as well as necessary peripheral accessories to Ottawa, Canada

**Solicitation Number:** 175024
**Amendment Number:** 2
**Publication Date:** November 2, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** December 12, 2022 at 1:00 PM EST

**Nature of Requirements:**

The Government of Canada, through Natural Resources Canada, seeks a supplier to provide two (2) automated sample dilution stations, along with necessary peripheral accessories, to be delivered and installed at a designated site in Ottawa, Canada.

**Governing Instrcutions:**

Only suppliers currently pre-qualified on Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies are invited to submit a bid. Any bids received from suppliers not pre-qualified on the Supply Arrangement will not be evaluated.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

1. Mandatory Technical Criteria: Supplier must meet the mandatory technical requirements outlined in the solicitation documents.
2. Lowest Aggregate Price: The supplier with the lowest aggregate price, meeting the mandatory technical criteria, will be recommended for contract award.

**Important Details:**

* This solicitation is reserved for holders of Supply Arrangement # E60PV-19EQUI ONLY.
* Suppliers that do not have a Supply Arrangement for the supply of Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies with Public Works and Government Services Canada, cannot submit a bid.
* Suppliers may qualify under Supply Arrangement E60PV-19EQUI for Laboratory and Scientific Equipment, Parts and Accessories, Services and Supplies at any time.

**Contact Information:**

For any clarification or questions, please contact:

Dhanani, Shazeen
Shazeen.Dhanani@rncan-nrcan.gc.ca
